title: Firefox crashes and I lose all my open windows.
content:
Why does this happen? I was even logged in, and my tab groups are gone. Why??? Do I need to use a different browser? And Firefox has had trouble with some websites where the paying portion is not correct. However, if I go to a different browser (Chrome), the paying portion works correctly. I'm getting kinda tired of these weird things going on. Please don't offer a feature that doesn't work like grouping tabs.

Today: Can't access website. I think it is the ISP or the router. Reset the router. No luck. Tried a different device on the Wifi. Works fine. Tried a different browser. works fine. Shut down Firefox. I had 2 browser instances open with several windows in each. Could not restart firefox, as it did not close correctly. I closed the broken instance(s). opened FF again, only got one set of windows, not both sets. The other instance had a bunch of grouped windows, and the groups seem to be gone. I can recreate most of those, but had some windows with ongoing work and things I wanted to look at and now they are gone.

FF crashed when I tried to get some answer from ediblearrangements.com help.
creator: mfmattran

title: LastPass icon not working
content:
When I click on the grey Last Pass icon, a "set preferences" screen is shown. The strictly necessary box is selected and I cannot change it. The Voluntary data collection box is clickable but does not make any difference if it is checked or unchecked. The screen is locked, no matter what I click or unclick. The only thing that I can do is to click the grey LP icon which closes the window.

On two other very similar computers, when the grey icon is clicked, I can search for passwords, alerts, account, etc. Why does the icon work on this computer. I've deleted the addin, deleted Firefox and reloaded several times.

Thank you
creator: cruisertwo
